isis.stitle: GAUGES AND WARNING LIGHTS - DESCRIPTION - ALARM

svcproc.title: ALARM
svcproc.para: A single electronically driven alarm is mounted on and plugs into the Speedo/Tach module. The alarm is a replaceable item. The alarm generates different tone sequences to alert the driver or service technician to the current alarm condition. The alarm will sound, reporting out-of-range conditions in the following manner:

step1.para: Low fuel - 5 short beeps and the low fuel light turns ON, and remains ON as long as the condition is present.
Low oil pressure - 5 short beeps and the low oil pressure light turns ON, and remains ON as long as the condition is present.
High water temperature - 5 short beeps and the high water temperature light turns ON, and remains ON as long as the condition is present.
Low air pressure - the alarm sounds short beeps continuouslyand the low air pressure light turns ON, and remains ON as long as the condition is present.

svcproc.para: The alarm is also used in the self-diagnostics of the Speedo/Tach module. That will be discussed in DIAGNOSTICS.
The Power Divider Lock warning system has its own optional alarm (not part of the Speedo/Tach module).
